basic_data.name: TruLaser Tube 7000 fiber
basic_data.additional_name: Material for processing: Steel, Stainless steel, Aluminum, Cast iron, Non-ferrous metals
basic_data.description: A versatile laser that enables fast and flexible processing, achieving high productivity. Its open design guarantees optimal accessibility and efficiency, even when processing individual parts, supported by the Central Link interface for Industry 4.0.

main_characteristics.title: Optimal safety and accessibility
content: The innovative machine concept with an intelligent beam protection cover provides the ideal combination of maximum safety and optimal operator accessibility. It allows efficient loading of individual tubes and easy retrieval of workpieces at an ergonomic working height.

main_characteristics.title: Cutting efficiency with RapidCut
content: RapidCut increases the cutting performance of the solid-state laser, enabling fast feed rates even for fine contours. This leads to additional productivity, especially when processing thin materials.

main_characteristics.title: Advanced technology for precise thread processing
content: Thanks to a comprehensive technology package that includes not only threading but also other processing methods such as thermal drilling or spiral drilling, these processes can be integrated into a single machine. Automation minimizes labor effort and reduces the risk of errors, resulting in higher precision and production efficiency.

specification.name: Max. raw material length for automatic loading
